titleStmt.title: The history of this iron age vvherein is set dovvn the true state of Europe as it was in the year 1500 : also, the original and causes of all the vvarres, and commotions that have happened : together with a description of the most memorable battels, sieges, actions and transactions, both in court and camp from that time till this present year 1656 : illustrated vvith the lively effigies of the most renowned persons of this present time / written originally by J. Parival and now rendred into English by B. Harris, Gent.
Abrégé de l'histoire de ce siècle de fer. English
titleStmt.author: Parival, Jean-Nicolas de, 1605-1669.
Harris, B. (Bartholomew)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Tyler and are to be sold by J. Crook, S. Miller and T. Davies ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Abrégé de l'historie de ce siècle de fer.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
